ddr_buf_req Struct Reference

Capture ddr buffer request. More...

#include <cvmx-ocla.h>

Data Fields

uint node
uint ix
uint size
uint64_t pbuf

Detailed Description

Capture ddr buffer request.

The kernel must fulfill the request as a physical address is needed by ocla.

node: Node to capture data on. ix: Ocla complex index. size: Size of ddr buffer. pbuf: Pointer to physicall address of ddr buffer.
